sources.title: Bakterion (1982)
sources.description: A scientist's experiment with a deadly bacteria goes awry and leaves him horribly deformed. The monstrous man then runs amok in his town. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/bakterion-1982/

metadata.Plot: A scientist's experiment with a deadly bacteria goes awry and leaves him horribly deformed. The monstrous man then runs amok in his town.
metadata.Writer: Víctor Andrés Catena, Jaime Comas Gil
metadata.Actors: David Warbeck, Janet Agren, Roberto Ricci
